title: Repaying Debt Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Repaying Debt Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Repaying Debt Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 202
items.arabic: ((بارَكَ اللَّهُ لَكَ فِي أَهْلِكَ وَمَالِكَ، إِنَّمَا جَزَاءُ السَّلَفِ الْحَمْدُ وَالأَدَاءُ)).
